title: Due date on Saturday, Sunday, or holiday
context: ยง231-21 Due date on Saturday, Sunday, or holiday. When the due date for any remittance or document required by any law imposing a tax falls on a Saturday, Sunday, or legal holiday, the remittance or document shall not be due until the next succeeding day which is not a Saturday, Sunday, or legal holiday.
